title: Miscellaneous Security Improvements
body:
1. Enforce no HTTP external links (from https://github.com/MyEtherWallet/MyEtherWallet/issues/556). 
Inspired by MM-01-001 from MetaMask Cure53 audit
    - [x] Integrate CI Script that fails on finding any non https links throughout codebase
    - [x] Additionally, convert all existing HTTP -> HTTPS (if there are any)

2. Prevent Reverse Tabnabbing
More information can be found here: https://github.com/asciidoctor/asciidoctor/issues/2071
    - [x] Create script to ensure `rel="noopener noreferrer"` is added to all anchor elements with` target="_blank"`
    - [x] Integrate into CI (exit code on finding elements without `rel`)
Related to https://github.com/MyEtherWallet/MyEtherWallet/issues/556

__This issue now has a funding of 0.13 ETH (85.38 USD) attached to it.__ * If you would like to work on this issue you can claim it [here](https://gitcoin.co/funding/details?url=https://github.com/MyEtherWallet/MyEtherWallet/issues/558). * If you've completed this issue and want to claim the bounty you can do so [here](https://gitcoin.co/funding/details?url=https://github.com/MyEtherWallet/MyEtherWallet/issues/558) * Questions? Get help on the Gitcoin Slack * $10090.93 more Funded OSS Work Available at: https://gitcoin.co/explorer
This is a very good find 👍
I'll claim this bounty.  Will claim through normal process later when I'm at my laptop.

per https://github.com/MyEtherWallet/MyEtherWallet/issues/556#issuecomment-351850137 , we will add a little more ETH to this issue sicne the scope of both issues has been folded together.

cc @wbobeirne @nemaniarjun can you work out with @rajatkapoor  @ethikz who wants to take this?

hey @ethikz mind posting an update ? cc @dternyak
@owocki yea sorry.  I have the js implemented and working for on the fly but working on adding the CI as well.
spoke to @ethikz on slack today and he can't do it anymore.  @rajatkapoor @eswarasai @jclancy93 @oojr any interest?

No worries @ethikz. Thanks for the attempt. 

I've folded https://github.com/MyEtherWallet/MyEtherWallet/issues/556 into this issue as well, since they were meant to be completed together.

I'd definitely like to re-suggest from #556 that for the sake of speed, thoroughness, and to warn us as we work, I'd suggest making this a tslint plugin that actually parses the AST rather than use regular expressions to catch these cases. There are plenty of examples in `tslint-react` of plugin checking for required or banned attributes.
I'll give this a shot

__The funding of 0.13 ETH (103.54 USD) attached has been claimed by @jclancy93.__ @jclancy93, please leave a comment to let the funder (@owocki) and the other parties involved your implementation plan. @jclancy93 Great. Definitely suggest going with @wbobeirne's suggestion of building a plugin.
@jclancy93 If you need assistance with implementing this with CI, please let me know!
@jclancy93 Yes, we already run tslint during CI, so that should do it!
haven't gotten to it yet today... but the plan is to close https://github.com/MyEtherWallet/MyEtherWallet/issues/556 and move the bounty amount (0.16 ETH) over here too :)

ok i have closed https://github.com/MyEtherWallet/MyEtherWallet/issues/556

the plan is to take the 0.16 and award it to whomever solves this PR.  i can't add more to the bounty formally because the current version of the gitcoin smart contract doesnt allow that (lame i know! were solving this soon).

cc @dternyak
@jclancy93 eager to see the progress on PR #663 be made :)

hey @jclancy93 👋 happy new year :) 

cool to see the progress on https://github.com/MyEtherWallet/MyEtherWallet/pull/663 -- hit me up when youre submitting the work and ill make sure you get bounty payout if/when time is ready.

nice!  definitely going to read through this later and see what's going on once I have more time.  Thanks for the understanding guys, @dternyak & @owocki, and thanks @jclancy93 for taking it over and making it better and @wbobeirne for the suggestion and insight
howdy @jclancy93, just joined @owocki at Gitcoin and wanted to check in here. any update in order to close this one out? apologies if i'm missing something!
hey @vs77bb, welcome to Gitcoin! Excited to see what you and @owocki build in the future! The PR was merged this morning 😄

@jclancy93 great to see you again.  👋 

@dternyak LMK when this is good to payout.

One small final issue and it should be good to go!
